BaseTemplate.description: Starter code for your Nextjs Boilerplate with Tailwind CSS

Index.meta_description: Next js Boilerplate is the perfect starter code for your project. Build your React application with the Next.js framework.

Counter.security_powered_by: Security, bot detection and rate limiting powered by

CounterForm.presentation: The counter is stored in the database and incremented by the value you provide.

About.about_paragraph: Welcome to our About page! We are a team of passionate individuals dedicated to creating amazing software.

Portfolio.presentation: Welcome to my portfolio page! Here you will find a carefully curated collection of my work and accomplishments. Through this portfolio, I'm to showcase my expertise, creativity, and the value I can bring to your projects.

PortfolioSlug.content: Created a set of promotional materials and branding elements for a corporate event. Crafted a visually unified theme, encompassing a logo, posters, banners, and digital assets. Integrated the client's brand identity while infusing it with a contemporary and innovative approach.

SignIn.meta_description: Seamlessly sign in to your account with our user-friendly login process.

SignUp.meta_description: Effortlessly create an account through our intuitive sign-up process.

Dashboard.alternative_message: Need advanced features? Multi-tenancy & Teams, Roles & Permissions, Shadcn UI, End-to-End Typesafety with oRPC, Stripe Payment, Light / Dark mode. Try <url></url>.

CrewDashboard.title: Scheduled Work
CrewDashboard.no_crew_message: Your account is not assigned to any crew. Please contact admin.
CrewDashboard.no_jobs_message: You have no assigned jobs at this time.

CrewJobList.no_jobs_message: Jobs assigned to your crew will appear here

JobExecutionWizard.step1_description: Capture 3 photos before starting the work:
JobExecutionWizard.step2_instructions: Now proceed with the glass installation. Follow all safety procedures and ensure the glass is properly sealed. Once complete, press 'Next' to continue.
JobExecutionWizard.installation_step_1: Prepare work area and protect vehicle interior
JobExecutionWizard.curing_time_reminder: Remember: Minimum curing time 2 hours before moving the vehicle
safety_points: Verify glass is clean and defect-free
JobExecutionWizard.step3_description: Capture 1 photo of the installed glass:
JobExecutionWizard.step4_description: Obtain customer signature to confirm job completion.
JobExecutionWizard.gps_failed: Failed to get GPS. Continuing anyway...
JobExecutionWizard.step5_description: Verify that all the information is correct.
JobExecutionWizard.error_message: Error completing the job. Please try again.

CrewManagement.title: Crew Management
CrewManagement.description: Assign users to crews for the mobile crew interface
CrewManagement.user_email_hint: Enter the email of the Clerk user you want to assign
instructions: User creates account via Clerk sign-up
Admin enters user's email above and selects their crew
System automatically assigns crew ID to user metadata
User can now access crew dashboard at /crew-dashboard
Jobs assigned to that crew will appear in their dashboard

CrewDebug.no_crew_id: No crew ID found in metadata
CrewDebug.fix_message: The crew ID in Clerk doesn't match any crew in Notion.
